title: Tale Of Hyangdan
description:
Description :
        "Yu Hyang Gi," a job seeker who has been struggling every dayOne day, it is possessed by the traditional story, Tale of Chunhyang's Hyangdan.What do you mean by supporting actress, and not the heroine? It's actually better!Our pretty lady Chunhyang and the madam who takes care of me like their family.Hyang-dan, who felt the warmth of her family only after being possessed by the novel, was living a peaceful day.Until he appeared!Byun Hak-do, the final villain of this story, is destined to be punished by the male lead Lee Mong-ryong while bullying Chun-hyang.How dare you try to steal our Chunhyang!"I don't know which family's child you are, but be more careful.""I've been waiting.""So I'll leave it to you, such an honor that no one else can get."But why do you keep getting involved with me?Why is that man paying more attention to me than Chunhyang!A romance fantasy between Hyangdan and Byun Hak-do, who twists the fairy tale, "Tale of Hyangdan."+
